description.name: Double Chain Universal Oil Filter Wrench 1/2" 24mm
description.long_desc:
Chain-Type Oil Filter Wrench uses the chain to wrap around any size/shape oil filter with the bar to tighten the grip and unscrew the filter.


Product Features



  • For use with 1/2 in. square drive accessory or 24mm spanner

  • Suitable for oil filters up to 130mm (5,1/4") Diameter Approx

description.name: Tool cabinet 7 drawers 680 x 460 x 995 mm
description.long_desc:
Professional workshop cabinet with 7 drawers.


Product Features



  • Integrated ergonomic handle within the worktop and anti-shock plastic worktop

  • 5 drawers 565 x 395 x 57 mm

  • 2 large drawers ideal for large tools and accessories

  • Drawers on telescopic full-extension ball-bearing slides

  • Self-locking drawer release preventing the drawers from sliding open accidentally

  • Heavy duty steel construction to provide strength and durability

  • Side perforated panels to hang tools and accessories

  • 4 castor wheels, 1 with a locking device







































Width Depth Height
Dimensions 680 mm 460 mm 840 mm
Dimensions with handle and castors 765 mm 460 mm 995 mm
Small Drawer 565 mm 395 mm 57 mm
Large Drawer 565 mm 395 mm 135 mm
Castors Size 125 mm 35 mm -

category.name: Pipe and Plastic Welders
category.path: Tools for Plumbers\Pipe and Plastic Welders

category_idosell.path: Tools for Plumbers\Pipe and Plastic Welders

description.name: Pipe welding machine 16-63mm Premium GEKO
description.long_desc:
Pipe Welding Machine 1500W. Application: connecting pipes and fasteners made of thermoplastic material such as Polyethylene, Polypropylene and Polybutylene. It allows welding pipes at a temperature of 0 to even 300° Celsius. Thanks to high power, the device heats up to the right temperature in a few seconds.


Product Features



  • Temperature regulation from 0 to 300 °

  • High Power 1500W

  • Comfortable ergonomic grip


Package Contents:



  • Pipe Welder 1500W

  • Stand on the sealer

  • Tape measure 3m / 10 feet

  • Gloves

  • HEX key 6 mm

  • HEX key 5 mm

  • Adapters for pipes 16, 20, 25, 32, 40, 50, 63 mm

  • Screwdriver PH
description.short_desc:
Pipe Welding Machine 1500W. Application: connecting pipes and fasteners made of thermoplastic material such as Polyethylene, Polypropylene and Polybutylene. It allows welding pipes at a temperature of 0 to even 300° Celsius. Thanks to high power, the device heats up to the right temperature in a few seconds.

  • Screwdriver PH

description.name: Adjustable work bench 0-90 degree
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Tabletop tilt adjustment from 0 to 90°

  • Adjustable working width

  • Ruler graduated in centimetres and inches

  • Folded down it takes up little space


Technical Data

































Dimensions [WxHxL]560 x 780 x 620 mm
Maximum jaw opening210 mm
Maximum tabletop opening100 mm
Tabletop dimensionstwo boards with dimensions of 620 x 100 x 20 mm
Tabletop dimensions after max opening620 x 300 mm
Maximum load100 kg
MaterialSteel profile, Wood

  • Ruler graduated in centimetres and inches

  • Folded down it takes up little space

Dimensions [WxHxL]560 x 780 x 620 mm
Maximum jaw opening210 mm
Maximum tabletop opening100 mm
Tabletop dimensionstwo boards with dimensions of 620 x 100 x 20 mm
Tabletop dimensions after max opening620 x 300 mm
Maximum load100 kg
MaterialSteel profile, Wood

description.name: 2T Floor jack, color box KELTIN
description.long_desc:
Mobilny podnośnik hydrauliczny o maksymalnym udźwigu 2 tony. Wyposażony w stalowe koła oraz uchwyt do przenoszenia. Idealnie sprawdzi się w przydomowym garażu.

Cechy produktu

  • Maksymalny udźwig 2 tony
  • Wysokość podnoszenia od 135 do 335 mm
  • Wygodny uchwyt do przenoszenia podnośnika
  • Cztery stalowe koła, w tym dwa skrętne

Dane techniczne

Udźwig 2 tony
Wysokość podnoszenia 200 mm
Minimalna wysokość 135 mm
Maksymalna wysokość 335 mm

description.name: 7pcs Insulated VDE Screwdriver Set 1000V model nr. 1
description.long_desc:
Insulated VDE Screwdriver Set 1000V 7pcs.


Product Features



  • Blade Insulation

  • VDE and GS embossed in the handle

  • Marking IEC 60900 and 1000V stamped on the insulating layer of the screwdriver


Package Contents:



  • Philips VDE Screwdriver PH0 x 75mm

  • Philips VDE Screwdriver PH1 x 80mm

  • Philips VDE Screwdriver PH2 x 100mm

  • Slotted VDE Screwdriver 0.5 x 3.0 x 75mm

  • Slotted VDE Screwdriver 0.8 x 4.0 x 100mm

  • Slotted VDE Screwdriver 1.0 x 5.5 x 125mm

  • 220-250V AC Voltage Detector Tester Screwdriver
